Introduction

ARrC, standing for Always Remember the Real Connection, is a 7-member multinational boy group under MYSTIC Story. The group made their debut on August 19th, 2024, marking them as the first boy group to debut under the company.

On July 3, 2024, MYSTIC Story officially announced their plans to debut a boy group sometime in mid-August. Subsequently, on July 8, 2024, ARrC’s official social media accounts were launched, and the group’s name was unveiled. Fans were also introduced to all 7 members: Jibeen, Doha, Kien, Rioto, Ziwoo, Choi Han, and Hyunmin.

On July 26, 2024, ARrC released the song "dummy", acting as their pre-debut single in time for the group's debut on August 19, 2024, with the EP "AR^C'".

On January 22th, 2025, MYSTIC Story announced that Ziwoo would be leaving the group due to personal reasons.

On January 30th, 2025, MYSTIC STORY announced that Andy joined ARrC as a new member and ARrC would continue as a 7-member group.
